remarks: Elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` are relations.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
metust.1 $e |- F = ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) $.
metustrel $p |- ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ A e. F ) -> Rel A ) $.
$d A a $.
$d D a $.
$d F a $.
$d X a $.
